title: Pac-Man
excerpt: Pac-Man is an action maze chase video game; the player controls the eponymous character through an enclosed maze. The objective of the game is to eat all of the dots placed in the maze while avoiding four colored ghosts.

title: Marketing Page
excerpt: A standalong react web page, created specifically for marketing/advertising campaign for a bank. The purpose is to capture info from contacts in exchange for something of value (No data is being stored/misused).

title: To-Do List
excerpt: A MERN stack To-Do list app. Working on backend to store items in MongoDB database.

title: Kanban Board
excerpt: A Notion inspired sortable drag and drop Kanban board

title: Playbook Sports
excerpt: Assisted in developing an intuitive user interface for the company website using tech stack.

title: Local Hoops
excerpt: This is a site I built during my time at Playbook Sports for a organization called Local Hoops. I built this site using Web Components, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also used a few plugins to help with the functionality of the site.
